subject: Re: [junit] Re: Suggestion: New addition to the Assert class
msgSnippet: ... tearDown is: - always called in the TestCase - never called in the junit.extensions.TestSetup BUT - always called in the junitx.extensions.TestSetup
messageBody:
> In my experience, in case of (for example) a NullPointerException,
> tearDown() is not (always) called (junit 3.8.1, no extensions).

tearDown is:

- always called in the TestCase
- never called in the junit.extensions.TestSetup
BUT
- always called in the junitx.extensions.TestSetup (JUnit-addons library)

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir R. Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
